title: Reptiles: a first film
creator_credit: George J. Holland, BFA Educational Media and Norman Bean Films
brief_description: Introduces basic information about the characteristics of reptiles: body temperature, skin types and habitats. Shows various reptiles in their natural environment including alligators, turtles, snakes and chameleons. Provides a recapitulation of the information presented. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
